name: DemoShield Project
summary: Learn about .DBD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DemoShield was formerly developed by Macrovision and was integrated with InstallShield. However DemoShield was discontinued in 2007 and Macrovision became Acresso Software in 2008.

description: Demo project created with DemoShield, a program for creating installable demos of software applications; also used for authoring multimedia presentations; saved in packaged format that can be distributed via disc or the Web.
